testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed When user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"..............passed When user enter date of birth...............................................passed When user enter email "test@example.com" field..............................passed When user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd".......................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"......................passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd9".....................passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed
